data.title: Simon Levie de Haan Eljon
data.text:
Simon Levie de Haan Eljon-Cohen, birth 6 Jan 1742 Amsterdam, died 24 Dec 1822 Haarlem, Kennemerland-archief:

Simon Cohen de Haan, 80 yrs.old, born in Amsterdam on 6 Jan 1742, spouse of Rebecca v.Praag.

Notifier: Simon Izaac Frank, acquaintance[= daughter-in-law's brother], tradesman, 21[?] yrs.old., son of Levie Samuel Cohen-Leitsan and Vrouwtje Freidche Levie Leib

Event: event between 1777 and 1783 Amsterdam Zeeburg cemetery:

on 28 Aw 5537 - child of Simon Levie Cohen

on 10 Adar II 5543 - stillborn child of Simon Levie Cohen-Katan

Married 1774 Amsterdam, dtb 748/98; witn.groom: brother Samuel Levie Cohen; witn.bride: f.Hendrik Hartog. to:

Rebecca Hendrik v.Praag Preger, birth MEI 1747 Amsterdam, died 13 MRT 1830 Haarlem, Kennemerland archief: (notification on 14 Mar)

Rebecca v.Praag, 72 yrs.old, widow of Simon de Haan, at Begijnhof, born in May 1747 in Amsterdam

2nd notifier: Hartog de Vries, cousin of the deceased, 55 yrs.old., daughter of Hendrik Henli Hartog Hirsch v.Praag Preger and Roosje Mozes Verdoner 5) Philip Liepman Simon de Haan-Cohen, birth 7 Aug 1792 Amsterdam, 'Circumcisions and Births in Amsterdam 1697-1811, by Jits v.Straten':

on 26 Aw 5552 - circumcision of Elieser Liepman ben Simon Kats ben Leib Cohen-Eljon., died 1 Aug 1850 Amsterdam, eeburg cemetery - on 4 Aug 1850:

Philip/Liepman Simon de Haan', 58 yrs.old, died of 'waterzucht', at Warmoesstr, married man.

G.A.A. Amsterdam - death registrations:

on 1 Aug 1850 - Philip Simon de Haan, dentist, 58 yrs.old, born in Haarlem, married to Judic Isac Frank.

Notifiers on 2nd of August: Simon Philippus de Haan, dentist, 38 yrs.old, at Amstel 86, son and Emanuel Philip Arons, 49 yrs.old, at Verwerstr., acquaintance.

Event: event 30 Nov 1821 Amsterdam death of child: G.A.A. Amsterdam - death registrations:

ebecca de Haan, 9 months old, daughter of Philippus de Haan & Judic Frank.

info courtesy of Dini Hansma)

Married 9 OKT 1811 Haarlem, Philip Simon v.Lochem[?], 19 yrs.old, from Haarlem, tradesman, son of Simon Levie Cohen v.Lochem & Rebecca v.Praag, and

Judic Isak Frank, 24 yrs.old, from Amsterdam, daughter of Isaak Barend Frank & Hanna Abraham. to:

Judic Isaac Frank, birth ONG 1783, died 8 Apr 1855 Amsterdam, Zeeburg cemetery - on 11 Apr 1855 - Judic Isaac Frank, 74 yrs.old, died of 'waterzucht', at Raamgracht 147, widow of Philippus de Haan.

G.A.A. Amsterdam death registrations:

on 8 Apr 1855 (notification on 9 April) - Judic Isaac Frank, 74 yrs.old, widow of Philippus de Haan, daughter of Izaak Barend Frank & Hanna Abraham, both deceased.

Notifiers: Nathan Mozes Willing, 33 yrs.old, at Raamgracht 147, salesman, son-in-law and Abraham Isaak Frank, wallpaperman, 68 yrs.old, brother., daughter of Isaac Eizik Barend Ber Frank and Anna Hanna Abraham Aberle
